text: If a module is missing in a Nlearn, the first step would be to identify which module is missing and why it is not present.
Please Double-check that the module is actually missing and attempt to logout and login again to verify whether the issue has been resolved.
In case if the issue remains unresolved, Contact the instructor or the support team to report the issue and ask for assistance.
Do you need me to make a complaint about this?
I'm sorry to hear that you're having trouble accessing the LMS. Here are some possible solutions:
Make sure that you have a stable internet connection and that you are connected to the network.
Clear your browser cache.
Check if LMS is down.
Please check whether you have made all semester payments up to date because if not, your account may be locked.
In case if the issue remains unresolved, Contact the support team to report the issue.
Do you need me to make a complaint about this?
I'm sorry to hear that you're having trouble accessing the DLE. Here are some possible solutions:
Make sure that you have a stable internet connection and that you are connected to the network.
Clear your browser cache.
Check if DLE is down.
Please check whether you have made all semester payments up to date because if not, your account may be locked.
In case if the issue remains unresolved, Contact the support team and ask for assistance.
Do you need me to make a complaint about this?
If you're having trouble connecting to a Wi-Fi network, here are a few things you can try:
Make sure you're within range of the Wi-Fi network and that it is turned on.
Make sure that you have the correct Wi-Fi network name and password for the university network.
Restart your device and try connecting again.
Try forgetting the Wi-Fi network on your device and then reconnecting to it.
Disable and re-enable Wi-Fi on your device.
Update your device's software and/or Wi-Fi drivers.
Reset your device's network settings and try connecting again.
Try connecting to the university's Wi-Fi network from another device to see if the issue is with your device or the network.
Check if the university's Wi-Fi network is down or if there are any scheduled maintenance activities.
In case if the issue remains unresolved,contact the university's IT support team for further assistance.
Do you need me to make a complaint about this?
I'm sorry to hear that you're experiencing issues with receiving emails. Here are some troubleshooting steps that might help:
Check your spam/junk folder
Check whether your email storage is full
Check your email settings
Please check whether you have made all fee payments up to date because if not, your account may be locked.
If none of the above solutions work, it's possible that there may be an issue with your email account
Do you need me to make a complaint about this?
If you are waiting for exam results and have not received them via email, here are some steps you can take:
Contact the organization that administered the exam
Be patient because Sometimes exam results can take longer than expected to be released.
Do you need me to make a complaint about this?
If you are unable to log into your Microsoft account, there are several steps you can take to troubleshoot the issue:
Double-check your login credentials
Check your internet connection
Try logging in from a different browser or a device because this can help you determine if the issue is with your device or your account.
If none of the above solutions work, it's possible that there may be an issue with your email account
Do you need me to make a complaint about this?
If your Microsoft account provided by your university gets locked, you can try the following steps to regain access:
Wait for a few minutes
Reset your password  by clicking on the "forgot password" link on the login page
If none of the above methods work, you can contact your university's IT support team for assistance.
It's essential to ensure that you are adhering to the university's policies and guidelines while using their provided Microsoft account to avoid getting locked out.
Do you need me to make a complaint about this?
If you have forgotten your Nlearn password,Could you please check the email that was sent earlier containing the login information and try with the password.
If the above method won't work, you can contact your university's IT support team for assistance.
Do you need me to make a complaint about this?
If you have forgotten your DLE password, there are several steps you can take to recover it:
Reset your password through the DLE login page
check the email that was sent earlier containing the login information and try with the password.
If you are unable to reset your password through the login page, contact your system administrator

check the email that was sent earlier containing the login information and try with the password.
If you are unable to reset your password through the login page, contact your system administrator

If you are having trouble marking your attendance, there are a few possible reasons why:
MAy be technical issues with the attendance system or the device you are using to access it. Try logging out and logging back in, or try using a different device.
Poor internet connectivity can sometimes prevent the attendance system from loading properly.Try reconnecting.
Make sure you are using the correct login credentials, including your username and password.
Attendance system is only available during certain hours, make sure you are trying to access it during those hours.
If none of these solutions work, you may need to reach out to your instructor or the IT support team for further assistance.
Do you need me to make a complaint about this?

cases.condition: $session.params.technical-problems = "Payment was made but the account is still not unlocked"

text: NOTE: Once your payment has been processed, it will undergo a verification process that will take up to two working days.
If you have made a payment but your account is still not unlocked, here are some possible reasons and solutions:
Delay in processing: Sometimes, it may take some time for the payment to be processed and reflected in your account. Wait for a few hours and check again.
May be technical issues causing the delay. Try logging out and logging back in or clearing your browser's cache and cookies.
Verify your payment details: Make sure that you have provided the correct payment details, including the correct amount and reference number.
If the payment has been processed before several days , but your account is still not unlocked, contact customer support service. They will be able to investigate the issue and help you resolve it.
Do you need me to make a complaint about this?
Here are some troubleshooting steps that might help:
Ensure that your device is connected to the correct WiFi network and that it is within range of the wireless access point.
If you are in a crowded area or a specific area where the WiFi signal is weak, try moving to a different location that is closer to the access point.
Reset the network
Check for network congestion.
Make sure your device's software and drivers are up to date. An outdated driver can cause connectivity issues.
If none of the above solutions work, contact your university's IT support team for assistance. They may be able to troubleshoot the issue or suggest alternative solutions.
Do you need me to make a complaint about this?
What may your problem be?
I am unable to find a solution to this problem. Please reach out to a member of the support team for assistance. Sorry for the inconvineince!!
